Text: Thank you for calling Comcast, Salison.
Can you give me just a minute?
How can I going to help you?
Alison, I'm calling because Comcast raised my rates again, and I don't understand why I have to pay more for the same service.
It's $4 more for the exact same thing I had before.
And the last four of your Social Security number?
Let me say you had a question about your bill or something?
Comcast keeps raising my rates and I'm tired of it.
Give me just a minute and take a look at your account, okay?
Can I put you on hold?
So I just took a look at your account and it looks like you're in the preferred cable package with the HD box.
And the HD went from $8 to $10 and your preferred package went from $16.95 to $18.
I don't understand why my rates keep getting increased.
Well, the program rears the rates and they charge Comcast.
So in turn, we have to charge you.
I'm going to go to satellite.
